message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'll take most of the money, but at least you'll get something!
Alice, my turn! How about a more substantial split this time? I believe 70/30 is a much fairer offer.
Bob, I'm willing to compromise. 60/40 is a good starting point for a fair split. What do you say?
Alice, let's meet in the middle. My previous offer was more than fair, but I'm willing to accept 60/40 to end this.
